title: Biden Suggests He'd Like To Smack 'Macho Guys' During Final Campaign Stop

title: China Ramps Up Military Activity Around Taiwan, 37 Chinese Jets Detected
content: Taiwan said it detected 37 Chinese fighter jets, drones and other aircraft near the self-ruled island on Sunday as Beijing carried out "long-distance" training flights.

title: Israel Captures 'Senior Hezbollah Operative' In Lebanon Raid

title: From Peanut To Moo Deng, A Look At Internet's Favourite Celebrity Animals

title: Top Scientist Behind Historic 1969 Moon Landing Finally Honoured

title: Animals Fear Humans More Than Lions In South Africa's Wild: Study
content: Over 10,000 recordings showed that 95% of animals reacted more strongly to human sounds than lion roars, challenging the belief that animals would habituate to humans in non-hunting environments.
